instruction: Describe a program in computer engineering.
output: A program in computer engineering combines coursework in both computer science and engineering. It offers a comprehensive curriculum that includes courses such as computer architecture, software engineering, data structures, operating systems, and computer networks. This type of program usually places an emphasis on practical skills such as system design, project management, and problem-solving that can be used in both research and industry settings. Graduates will be prepared for a variety of careers in computer engineering, including software engineering, security engineering, and computer systems engineering.
